title: Video game season is here! [The Resties]
description: The annual video game deluge has begun. This week, we played not one, not two, but three inventive new games. Arcade Paradise asks players to split their time between running a laundromat and launching a local arcade. Rollerdrome mixes Tony Hawk's Pro Skater with Max Payne. And Drainus is to R-Type what Stardew Valley is to Harvest Moon. What does that mean? Listen to the show and find out!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante, The Resties)
